trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TextBoxAutomationPeer"></xref> class.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TextBoxAutomationPeer"></xref>.
Gets the control type for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TextBoxAutomationPeer"></xref>.
Gets the name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TextBoxAutomationPeer"></xref>.
Gets the control pattern for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TextBoxAutomationPeer"></xref>.

The following table describes what the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FlowDocumentScrollViewerAutomationPeer.GetPattern%2A> method returns when depending on the value of `patternInterface`: |The value of `patternInterface`|The return value| |-------------------------------------|----------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface>|A reference to the current instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TextBoxAutomationPeer>.| |<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface>|The <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ScrollViewerAutomationPeer> for this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TextBoxAutomationPeer>.| |<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface>|An object that implements the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITextProvider> interface.| |<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface>|An object that implements the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISynchronizedInputProvider> interface.|
An object that supports the control pattern if patternInterface is a supported value; otherwise, .
This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the value is read-only; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if it can be modified.
This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
A string value of the control.
